GSP28prakp09u:0: oṃ śrīmatprabhākaragurutantradhurandhareṇa mahāmahopādhyāya-śālikanāthamiśreṇa praṇītā prakaraṇapañcikā nyāyasiddhyākhyayā vyākhyayā viṣamasthalaṭipparāyā
GSP28prakp09u:5: yadyuccaritamātravināśī śabdo bhavet, tadā tasya vṛddhavyavahāreṇa
GSP28prakp09u:7: bhūyobhūyaḥ prayogadarśane hi tattadasvārthaparihāreṇa niṣkṛṣya svārthābhidhānasāmarthyamavadhāryate
GSP28prakp09u:9: svārthābhidhānasāmarthyānavadhāraṇe ca prathamaśruta iva śabdo nār'thamavabodhayitumalam955
GSP28prakp09u:10: arthañcānavabodhayataḥ prāmāṇyamayuktamiti, śabdasya prāmāṇyamicchatā yuktamabhidhānasya nityatvasthānamiti saprayojanamidam /
GSP28prakp09u:13: ucyate---na pratyuccāraṇaṃ bhinneṣu varṇeṣu gatvādikaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyate,
GSP28prakp09u:15: yatra hi bhedamadhyavasyata evābhedajñānam, tatrānyathānupapattyā sāmānyāśrayaṇaṃ ghaṭate
GSP28prakp09u:18: nanu ca yuktaṃ śuktikārajatādiṣu bhedāgrahaṇādabhedavyavahāra iti
GSP28prakp09u:19: sāmānyāsambhavaḥ, nedaṃ rajatamiti bādhakapratyayodayāt, iha tu sāsānyopapatterbhrāntikalpanā niṣpramāṇikaiva, nāyaṃ gakāra iti
GSP28prakp09u:27: kiñca puruṣaprayatnānantaraṃ hi śravaṇaṃ śabdasya dvedhāvakalpate---prāgajātatvādanupalabdhaḥ, prayatnena janita upalabhyatāmāpadyate, anabhivyaktatvādvābhivyajyata iti /
GSP28prakp09u:28: tatra na tāvat---prayatnasya śabdaṃ pratyabhivyañjakatvaṃ sambhavati /
GSP28prakp09u:32: na ca śabdasyendriyasambandhaḥ pratibandhuṃ śakyate, nityatvāt /
GSP28prakp09u:35: ākāśo hvi śrotrendriyaṃ śabdavattvāt, śabdopalambhakatayā ca śabdavattvaṃ
GSP28prakp09u:37: yathā---cakṣū rūpopalambhakaṃ rūpavat, tathā śrotramapi śabdavat /
GSP28prakp09u:38: ākāśaśca śabdavāniti sa eva śrotram, tadguṇaśca śabdastasminnityasamaveta iti, na tasyā'varaṇasambhavaḥ
GSP28prakp09u:43: rūpam, parimāṇam, saṃkhyeti sarvaṃ sakṛdeva pradīpādabhirabhivyajyate /
GSP28prakp09u:47: atha śrotrendriyasaṃsakara eva śabdasyābhivyaktiriṣyate, na so 'pi
GSP28prakp09u:50: nā'pyālokenevā'pyāyanaṃ963 cākṣuṣasya raśmeḥ koṣṭhyānāṃ vāyūnām, ākāśasya
GSP28prakp09u:52: ghaṭāyonmīlitaṃ cakṣuḥ paṭaṃ na hi na 965budhyate //
GSP28prakp09u:53: “ ślo. vā. śa. a. ślo. 60. 61 iti /
GSP28prakp09u:60: kena punaḥ prakāreṇa prayatnena śabda utpādyate /
GSP28prakp09u:63: vāyośca gatimattvāt, tadārabdhaśśabdo 'pi gatimān karṇaśaṣkulīmaṇḍalāvacchinnena nabhasā śrotrabhāvamāpanneva saṃyuktassannupalabhyate /
GSP28prakp09u:64: vegākhyasaṃskāranibandhanā ca vāyorgatiriti, tadapagame gativicchedād dūre
GSP28prakp09u:77: śabdaśśabdāntaramārabhate, tadapi śabdāntaramiti karṇaśaṣkulīmaṇḍalāvacchinne nabhasi śrotrabhāvamāpanne
GSP28prakp09u:81: kiñca---abhivyaṅgyaścet prayatnena śabdo na pratiyatnaṃ bhedenopalabhyeta /
GSP28prakp09u:85: yathā kārakavekalakṣaṇyānuvidhāyinī kāryavailakṣaṇyasiddhiravihatā, tathā vailaṇye 'pi cābhivyañjakasyābhivyaṅyavailakṣaṇyaṃ na sambhavati /
GSP28prakp09u:86: śabdastu prayatnasya mṛdutve, balavattve ca mṛdurbalavāṃścopalabhyamānastatkāryatāṃ na jahātīti /
GSP28prakp09u:90: yadi śakṣyāmaśśabdasya spaṣṭaṃ pratyabhijñānamupadarśayitum, tadā prayatnasya kārakatve niṣiddhe, abhivyañjakatve ca sthite,
GSP28prakp09u:113: svābhāvikī hi yasya sambandhavyāptiḥ, tasya liṅgatvam /
GSP28prakp09u:115: iha tu na śakyate nirṇetuṃ---kimekendriyagrāhyatayā ghaṭādīnām,
GSP28prakp09u:126: api ca na vayaṃ sthiravāyvapanayaṃ saṃskāramācakṣmahe, kintu
GSP28prakp09u:128: kimiti tarhi bhāṣyakāreṇa”stimitāni vāyvantarāṇī” tyuktam ? koṣṭhyasya vāyorvegavināśārtham
GSP28prakp09u:129: 984sparśavaddravyasaṃyogādvi vegavināśo 'nyatra pratīti iti, ihāpi tadarthameva sthiravāyukīrtanaṃ985 bhāṣye /
GSP28prakp09u:130: nanu caikatvādākāśasya, tasya ca śrotratvāt tatsaṃskāre, sarvapuruṣendriya saṃskārāt sarve 'pi śabdamupalabheran /
GSP28prakp09u:132: karṇaśaṣkulīsaṃskāro hi śrotrasaṃskāraḥ, bhinnāśca pratipuruṣaṃ kārṇaśaṣkulya iti, asaṃskṛtakarṇaśaṣkulīko na śabdamupalabhate /
GSP28prakp09u:148: prāptāvapi nendriyaṃ śabdadeśamupasarpati, pratayakṣatvācchotradeśe karṇaśaṣkulyāḥ prativātā-nuvātayośca tulyopalambhāpatteḥ /
GSP28prakp09u:149: śabde tu śrotrapathaṃ prāpta upalabhyamāne deśabhedaḥ pratīyate /
GSP28prakp09u:155: tena śabdaṃ śṛṇvatastadabhivyajjakadeśo 'pi tadavinābhāvopakalpito buddhistho bhavati /
GSP28prakp09u:159: yastu na tathā vivektumalam, tasyābhivyañjakadeśaṃ prati vyāmoho dṛśyata eva /
GSP28prakp09u:163: vailakṣaṇyaṃ svabhāvane varṇānāṃ na ca sammatam /
GSP28prakp09u:165: spaṣṭe tadgrahe prayatnastāvadvarṇānāṃ janako neti sthite,
GSP28prakp09u:168: kintu balavati prayatne mahān vāyurutpadyate, 992tasyāvayavā bhūyāṃsaḥ karṇaśaṣkulīmaṇḍalasya nemibhāgairbahubhissambadhyante /
GSP28prakp09u:169: tataścābhivyajjakasaṃyogabahutvāt, yugapadupalambhakabahutvāt, teṣāñca vicchedāgrahaṇānmahāniva śabdo 'vabhāti, tarūṇāmantarālāgrahaṇādiva mahadvanam /
GSP28prakp09u:170: yadā te vāyvavayavāssahasā, vilambena vā saṃyujyante, tadopalambho 'pi
GSP28prakp09u:172: yadā tveṣāmuccāraṇe tālvādīnāṃ saṃvṛtatvaṃ bhavati, tadā tadanurodhena varṇopalabdhirapi ekamātrākālaiva bhavatīti, hvasvavarṇavyavahārasiddhiḥ /
GSP28prakp09u:173: yadā 993vivṛtataratvam, asaṃvṛtatvaṃ vā tālvādīnāmeva sampadyate, tadā varṇapratīterapi mātrākālavṛddhyā
GSP28prakp09u:175: na caivamabhidhānasyānityatvadoṣa, tadupādhiviśiṣṭasya varṇasya vācakasyānityatvāt1 ato varṇānupūrvyanityatve na kaściddoṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp09u:180: śabde punaruccarita-tirohite, punaruttarakāle kathaṃ pratyabhijñodaya iti
GSP28prakp09u:183: yadi hyayaṃ niyamaḥ--tadupalambha eva tatsaṃskārodbodhaheturiti, tato nopapadyate śabde pratyabhijñā
GSP28prakp09u:184: saṃskārāstvaniyatodbodhahetava iti, kāraṇāntaravaśenodbuddhāt saṃskārāt prathamasamāgamasamaya eva śabde pratyabhijñā bhaviṣyati /
GSP28prakp09u:187: dṛṣṭo hi śuktikāyāṃ bhedāgrahāt”tadevedaṃ rajatami”ti pratyayaḥ---iti /
GSP28prakp09u:192: śabde tu na pratyakṣasiddhaḥ pratyuccāraṇaṃ bhedaḥ /
GSP28prakp09u:196: mahattvā-lpatve pratiyato 'pi, varṇapratīte mahattvā-lpatve eva bhinne avabhātaḥ, na varṇāḥ
GSP28prakp09u:197: na vā'numānenāpi bhedo 'vagantuṃ śakyata iti prāgeva niveditam /
GSP28prakp09u:198: ato bhede pramāṇābhāvāt, abhinna evāyaṃ bhinnāvabhāsa iti,
GSP28prakp09u:207: nanu kimiti tadgrahabalājjvālāyāmapi bhedānumānaṃ na nirākriyataityata
GSP28prakp09u:214: na ca dravyāśritā rūpādayo dravyaṃ virahayya vartante /
GSP28prakp09u:234: iti mahāmahopādhyāyaśrīśālikanāthamiśrapraṇītāyāṃ prakaraṇapañcikāyāṃ nyāyaśuddhirnāma navamaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam1006 //
